articles.title: Yang Hengjun: Australian writer given suspended death sentence in China - BBC.com
articles.description: Yang Hengjun was arrested on a 2019 trip to China and accused of spying.
articles.content:
By Tiffanie TurnbullBBC News, Sydney
Yang Hengjun has been detained in China since 2019
Australian writer Yang Hengjun has been given a suspended death sentence by a Chinese court, five years after… [+3732 chars]
